topic.title: Feature request: Archive
topic.body: Sometimes there are sites that I don't want to see show up on my welcome screen any more but don't necessarily mind seeding. Here is an example. One time I was just searching around and I came across a site with philipeno news stories. I don't speak philipeno so it's no use to me. But I surely would be happy to seed it for people who do speak philipeno. I deleted it from my directory because I didnt want random asian characters on my welcome screen but it would have been nice to have the option to continue to seed without seeing it on my welcome screen.

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: love is an emotion that evolved to further the success of our species

1_1LxkfGxtWhktAJ5WJ9ZnKxksTSH37qm8cC.body: Confirmed works great for me on firefox. Next level would be if we could start playing the song once the first block downloaded with a light priority weighting on earlier blocks. Very very cool.

1_17bo4yV2YQ8qERFytHMogwancQzQmzzaDM.body: Perhaps a more descriptive designation for this phenomena might be "decentralized emergent intelligence."

7604_1KbV1e1u6P6AsY8XNBydgtbtN8iSB5WMyG.body: Throw a vpn on the pile for good measure.
